price: Na obi a ͻno deε osuroo sε ͻbɛgyina ne Wura Nyankopͻn anim, na osii ne kraa ho kwan frii honam apεdeε anaa honam akͻnͻdeε ho no,
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفۡسَ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man khāfa maqāma rabbihi wanahā al-nafsa ʿani al-hawā
